tool_description: Monitors and analyzes competitor pricing data to inform competitive positioning and pricing strategy decisions.

product_categories.description: Product categories to monitor pricing for

error_messages: Empty competitor list: Provide at least one competitor ID to monitor.
Invalid product categories: Ensure product_categories contains valid category names.
Too many competitors: Maximum 50 competitors can be monitored simultaneously.
Competitor data unavailable: Some competitors do not have accessible pricing data.
usage: Provide competitor_ids to monitor and product_categories to track. Returns current competitive pricing landscape and positioning analysis.

competitor_prices.description: Current competitor price points by category

market_position.description: Your market position relative to competitors

competitive_intelligence.description: Summary of competitive pricing insights and trends
